lmhdepcrawler module¶

This is the entry point for the Local Math Hub utility.

usage: lmhdepscrawl [-h] [--apply]
Options:
--apply=False Option specifying that files should be changed
lmhdepcrawler.add_parser(subparsers)¶
lmhdepcrawler.add_parser_args(parser)¶
